duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee ambulatory capital projects, ensuring timely completion within budgetary constraints.
Lead and coordinate design and construction activities, managing contracts, timelines, and quality control.
Ensure compliance with legal and regulatory requirements and build relationships with key stakeholders.
Drive to job sites in Santa Rosa, Napa, and Petaluma to oversee project delivery.
Manage and interpret lease language and work letters for construction projects.
Travel to job sites in Napa, Santa Rosa, and Petaluma to ensure successful project completion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Construction Management, Project Management, or Business Administration (or equivalent work experience)
